text:
When I link to a jsp page ,the jsp page will execute 2 times

this is my log:

2002-11-05 22:44:44,696 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] querykeyword.jsp start.
2002-11-05 22:44:44,696 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] arrKeyword is null
2002-11-05 22:44:44,696 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] querykeyword.jsp end.
2002-11-05 22:44:44,774 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] querykeyword.jsp start.
2002-11-05 22:44:44,774 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] arrKeyword is null
2002-11-05 22:44:44,775 DEBUG [querykeyword.jsp] querykeyword.jsp end.

I don't know why.
Can you help me?
creator: dragzhb@163.net
dragzhb@163.net
text:
I have found the node of problem. The problem is special character. <% System.out.println("Test jsp start."); %> JSP DATE EXAMPLE

Search By Date
<% System.out.println("Test jsp start."); %> 2. The following jsp will only execute 1 times. <%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=GB2312" %> <% System.out.println("Test jsp start."); %> JSP DATE EXAMPLE

Search By Date
<% System.out.println("Test jsp start."); %> do you know why?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I don't know. I wouldn't have believed it without the test case. In any case, it
looks like a client side thing to me; I don't see anything Tomcat could do to
prevent this.
